campaign_brief.sample_headlines: Join Thousands of Happy Customers! See What Everyone is Raving About.
campaign_brief.value_propositions: Build trust and credibility by showcasing positive customer reviews, testimonials, and user-generated content. Address concerns about online eyewear purchases by demonstrating satisfaction from other customers.

campaign_brief.sample_headlines: Express Yourself: Find the Perfect Frames to Match Your Vibe.
campaign_brief.value_propositions: Emphasize the emotional connection people have with their glasses as a fashion statement and form of self-expression. Tap into the desire to find frames that reflect personality and style.
